title: Emotionally Overwhelmed
description: Sterling Shea interviews Tim Gerend and Aditi Javeri Gokhale, from Northwestern Mutual, on their response to the pandemic, hiring, reinvesting in technology and helping advisors improve their practices in order to serve an increasingly anxious public.
itunes:author: Barron's Advisor
itunes:summary: Sterling Shea interviews Tim Gerend and Aditi Javeri Gokhale, from Northwestern Mutual, on their response to the pandemic, hiring, reinvesting in technology and helping advisors improve their practices in order to serve an increasingly anxious public.
